meanings.definition: To need or demand something as necessary or essential.
meanings.sent1: Finishing the project on time is requiring a lot of effort.
meanings.sent2: Studying for the exam is requiring focus and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The cat is requiring attention by sitting on the keyboard.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for music is requiring her to practice every day.
meanings.sent5: The marathon is requiring participants to train rigorously.

meanings.definition: To make necessary; compel or obligate.
meanings.sent1: The new law is requiring all citizens to wear seat belts.
meanings.sent2: The doctor is requiring the patient to take the prescribed medication.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy is requiring the owner to puppy-proof the house.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected rain is requiring everyone to seek shelter.
meanings.sent5: The urgent situation is requiring immediate action from the team.
